examples.name: Daily Dose of Stupid
examples.description: A tongue-in-cheek style fake publication that lovingly mocks just about everything.

examples.name: Jack is Abroad
examples.description: A lot of people went abroad during college. I wasn't one of them. So I felt compelled to be bitter about it, via the written word.

examples.name: Music
examples.description: I've occasionally contributed to this music blog, which focuses primarily on indie-rock albums I'm a fan of.
